p:
Nearly half of patients with mCRC responded well to IRI (aCRCS A1 + B1, 46.8%), while only about 20% responded well to OX (aCRCS B2, 18.5%). Therefore, the PFS of IRI‐based therapy was consistently better compared with OX‐based therapy, although the difference was not statistically significant.
